info.name: Google - Rainbow Dash [recycled]
info.description: Pretty rainbow ponies floating in the clouds. You can make the clouds float, if you like.
info.additionalInfo: Adapted from style 65250, which presumably was adapted from style 61035. (Dunno - doesn't say.) Changes are described here.
